scripts.publish: cd packages/solidjs-show-code && npm run build && npm publish
scripts.start-local: cd examples/solidjs-show-code && npm run prepare && npm run start
scripts.start-live: cd examples/solidjs-show-code && npm install solidjs-show-code@latest && npm run start
scripts.install: cd packages/solidjs-show-code && npm install && cd ../../examples/solidjs-show-code && npm install
